descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Maxi Kleber hauls in the perfect dime from Luka Doncic and drains the three-pointer for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet pass from Luka Doncic) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka Doncic with the absolute dime to Maxi Kleber for 3-pointer

videos.description: Dwight Powell soars through the paint and slams home the lob for the alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet dime from Luka Doncic) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Powell elevates and throws down the lob from Doncic

videos.description: Rick Carlisle gets emotional as he's serenaded by fans after watching a heartfelt tribute video dedicated towards his time as the Dallas Mavericks head coach.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rick Carlisle can't hold back tears in his return back to Dallas) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rick Carlisle can't hold back tears in his return back to Dallas

videos.description: Josh Green gathers the rock and lays it in to extend the Mavericks' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Maxi Kleber makes beautiful dime for a basket) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Maxi Kleber feeds the rock to Josh Green for the bucket

videos.description: Luka Doncic gets past the Pacers' defense and drains the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Doncic somehow gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka drives into the paint and drains the and-1

videos.description: Caris LeVert won't be denied as he muscles through his defender for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Caris LeVert drains bucket vs Dallas Mavericks) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Caris LeVert somehow gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Luka Doncic launches a full-court dime to Dorian Finney-Smith who finishes with the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Doncic makes beautiful dime for a basket) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Check out this amazing full-court dime from Luka

videos.description: Luka Doncic puts on a clinic as he welcomes Rick Carlisle back to Dallas with a 30-point performance, leading the Mavericks to a 132-105 victory over the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka Doncic highlights vs. Indiana Pacers) 2022/01/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka drops 30-point double-double as Mavs roll Pacers
